## Commit Style Guide
We follow the [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/) style for our commit messages. Here are some examples:
- `feat: add new user authentication module`
- `fix: resolve issue with data fetching.`
- `docs: update README with installation instructions`
- `style: format code with Prettier`
- `refactor: improve performance of data processing`
- `test: add unit tests for user service`
- `chore: update dependencies`
- `security: patch vulnerability in authentication module
- `ci: add GitHub Actions workflow for CI/CD`
- `perf: optimize image loading speed`
- `infrastructure: set up database migrations`
